local_intent: Perceive white_plate if needed, approach and align, execute pick using white_grasp with one retry, verify grasp stability.
assumptions: white_grasp was computed previously and refers to a valid top grasp pose
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT grasp phase and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: ensures perception fallback, performs approach/align, attempts pick (with retry), and checks grasp stability before continuing to placement.
